summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the FBetaScore metric, checking correct computation, handling of background class exclusion, compatibility with different devices, validation of input dimensionality, consistency of output shapes, and robustness to edge cases such as zero true positives and NaN values.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and accuracy of the FBetaScore evaluation metric within the MONAI framework, supporting trustworthy model performance assessment in medical imaging applications.
